text: Psalm 21
Joy in the Salvation of Yahweh
For the \add music\add* director. A psalm of David.\f + \fr Ps 21 \ft The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm; the English verse number is reduced by one \f*
O Yahweh, \add the\add* king will rejoice in your strength,
and how greatly he will delight in your help.\f + \fr 21:1 \ft Or “victory” \f*
You have given him the desire of his heart,
and have not withheld the request of his lips. \qs Selah\qs*
For you meet him \add with\add* blessings of good \add things\add*.
You set on his head a crown of fine gold.
He asked life from you; you gave \add it\add* to him—
length of days forever and ever.
His honor \add is\add* great because of your help.\f + \fr 21:5 \ft Or “victory” \f*
Splendor and majesty you have bestowed upon him.
For you set \add on\add* him blessings forever.
You make him glad with \add the\add* joy \add of\add* your presence.
Because the king trusts Yahweh,
and through the steadfast love\f + \fr 21:7 \ft Or “loyal love” \f* of the Most High
he shall not be moved.
Your hand will find all your enemies;
your right hand will find those who hate you.
You will make them like your fiery furnace
at the time of your appearance.
Yahweh will swallow them in his wrath
and fire will consume them.
You will destroy their ⸤offspring⸥\f + \fr 21:10 \ft Literally “fruit” \f* from \add the\add* earth,
and their ⸤descendants⸥\f + \fr 21:10 \ft Literally “seed” \f* from among \add the\add* children of humankind.
Though they have ⸤plotted⸥\f + \fr 21:11 \ft Literally “spread out” \f* evil against you,
\add though\add* they have planned a scheme, they will not prevail.
For you will ⸤turn them to flight⸥;\f + \fr 21:12 \ft Literally “make them a shoulder” \f*
you will aim \add arrows\add* on your bowstrings at their faces.
Be exalted, O Yahweh, in your strength,
and we sing and praise your power.
